questions.question_text:
Northern Trail Outfitters (NTO) wants to ensure its emails are meeting subscriber expectations and enticing engagement.
Which two best practices should NTO employ when sending email? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: AC
A . Use subscriber data to dynamically populate email content.
C . Set cadence expectations up front with subscribers.

choices.C: Set cadence expectations up front with subscribers.
choices.B: Send multiple emails a day to keep the brand top of mind.
choices.A: Use subscriber data to dynamically populate email content.
choices.D: Send generic content to appeal to all audiences.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: AD
When creating a data extension for sending email campaigns, the marketer should follow these two steps:

Selected Answer: AD
When creating a data extension for sending email campaigns, the marketer should follow these two steps:

A. Set the column with Subscriber Key as Primary Key:
The Subscriber Key is a unique identifier for each subscriber, and it is essential for identifying and managing individual subscribers in Marketing Cloud. When setting up the data extension, the column with the Subscriber Key should be designated as the Primary Key. This ensures that each record in the data extension is uniquely identified by the Subscriber Key, preventing any duplicates and allowing for accurate data management.

D. In Properties, check the "Is Sendable" option:
The "Is Sendable" option in the Properties of the data extension should be checked to indicate that the data extension is eligible for use in email sends. Enabling this option allows the data extension to be used as a target for email campaigns and ensures that the data within the data extension can be sent to subscribers.

Options B (Set the Email address column as Primary Key) and C (Relate the Email Address to Subscriber Key) are not necessary or recommended

choices.C: Relate the Email Address to Subscriber Key
choices.A: Set the column with Subscriber Key as Primary Key
choices.D: In Properties, check the ג€Is Sendableג€ option
choices.B: Set the Email address column as Primary Key

questions.question_text:
An account will be providing a unique key for each subscriber from an external system. A marketer wants to create a data extension for sending email campaigns.
Which two steps should the marketer take when creating the data extension? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
A is correct

Selected Answer: A
answer is A

Selected Answer: A
Option A is the safest and most effective way for the marketer to accomplish the task of reviewing test emails in Content Builder prior to live deployment.
Option B (Create a list composed of the management team, prepend "Test" to the Subject, and use the Send Flow to send the email to the list) and Option C (Find each individual with Subscriber Preview and Test Send to each individual Recipient) are not the most efficient and practical approaches for sending test emails to the management team. Both options require more manual effort and may not provide a consolidated view of the test emails.

Option D (Create a data extension composed of the management team, create a User-Initiated Send Definition, select the email, prepend "Test" to the Subject, select the data extension, and send the email) is also a viable option, but it involves additional steps compared to Option A, which offers a more straightforward process using Test Send directly from Content Builder.

Selected Answer: A
It will be A

Correct anser is A: To schedule one Test Send and deliver to each of the 15 members of the management team. As for displaying content personalized to the individual team member, the Test Send wizard has an option for exactly that (Based on recipient test data extension).

questions.question_text:
A 15-person management team wants to review test emails in Content Builder prior to live deployment based on content that is personalized for them, but is clearly noted as a test email.
What is the safest, most effective way for a marketer to accomplish this task without compromising the email content?

choices.B: Create a list composed of the management team, prepend ג€Testג€ to the Subject, and use the Send Flow to send the email to the list.
choices.A: Create a Test data extension composed of the management team and Test Send to the Test data extension.
choices.D: Create a data extension composed of the management team, create a User-Initiated Send Definition, select the email, prepend ג€Testג€ to the Subject, select the data extension, and send the email.
choices.C: Find each individual with Subscriber Preview and Test Send to each individual Recipient.

questions.question_text:
A customer wants to automate nightly imports and also have the ability to manually import files via the Import Wizard.
What should be configured in the Marketing Cloud account?

choices.B: Include the mailing address of the sender.
choices.C: Ensure an opt-out link is present.
choices.A: Include a phone number to call.
choices.D: State why the subscriber is receiving the email.

questions.question_text:
A marketer plans to send a Commercial email.
Which two criteria should be met to ensure compliance with the CAN-SPAM Act? (Choose two.)
